entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
